caption.title: Map of the global tropical cyclones tracks from International Best Track Archive for Climate Stewardship (IBTrACS).
caption.p: (Top) paths from 1842 to 1960; (Bottom) paths from 1961 to 2017;(Left) Map projection on longitude 10°E ∼170°W; (Right) Map projection on Longitude 170°W ∼10°E.
